title: BRING BACK TEAM BUILDER!!!! WTF??!!
body: I only play ADC (Specifically MF) because that's really all I like to do (don't want to play if i cant be who i want to be).... So why now can I not be her without a chance of being banned (draft pick norms) or being beaten to the keyboard in typing "adc" in chat to reserve a spot in blind pick norms.....first day of new champ select and ive never felt this game has ever been trolly til now.... please fix this.... i think you guys went overboard on the update this time.... ive had to now dodge 5 games.... Really hope this gets heard.

replies.body: but it at least allowed you to play where and with whom you wanted... i dont want to be forced to play a champ i havent practiced and am not familiar with...

I liked team builder until two things happened. First, they added mmr modification for how experiences you are on a champ. That kind of tampering with matchmaking was bullshit. Second, it became nothing more than an endless stream of op champs with even less variety than ranked. At least in normal draft and ranked you can force a little more variety through bans. The second is more a problem with the player base not team builder though.

I don't need variety when all i play is MF... there is so much variety to this game and unfortunately they just removed the only ensured way i can play my champ every game without playing bots.... and even then keyboard hounds are all over typing adc faster than anyone else.... Don't play team builder if you want variety....

Team builder was originally touted as the place to try things out and experience more variety and strange comps when it was launched. The reality wss i often spent more time getring kicked from group to group trying to get a match where people woyld accept my strange pick than i did playin. That is why it became a problem for me and I stopped playing it. If it was originally advertised as a tryhard mode, I wouldn't have been so upset with it.
This was actually the number one comment on the  initial post about dramatic queues but they said they are working on at blind Version that would allow you to get your champion if you lock them in

not really the point.... MF is really only  bot lane adc.... i understand from some sources she can go mid and be viable but i specifically play adc bot and if i want to play that with MF every game i try to get in then i should be able to...
They are going to make a version of the new champ select without bans
I feel like it should've been an option with the release of this most recent update.... JS

To be honest, knowing how to play more than one ADC is pretty nice to have under your belt.

MF will be banned, even after her nerf, because really it's just how things are. People have to adapt, I know new champ select isn't what a lot of people want, but. \o\

I play ashe, ez, and lucian on occasion and if i "choose"to play one of them thats fine.... but i dont like being forced to play champs i dont have a hell of alot of experience playing..... thats what aram is for....
No it isnt.... aram is worthless for learning champs.
You play a minority queue?  Get in line with the Dominion and Twisted Treeline people, Riot doesn't care about minority queues.

What game have you even been playing?{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Team Builder was crap and highly flawed. You SHOULD know how to play more than one role and champion.
Just queue for ADC & Mid and then play her AP if you get mid. Easy peasy.
